name: Island Invasion (itch)
description:
In this tower defense you have to gather coconuts to build your towers and defeat your enemies. Be sure to plant your trees on the right place !

You have seeds to plant trees or tu upgrade your towers and coconuts to build and place towers !

Credits : 

Music:

Desert Theme by yd

Epic battle theme for RPG by Cynicmusic

Death is just another path

Battle March by PlayOnLoop

Assets:

Low poly paper boat

Coconut Palm Tree pack

Customized Weapon - Low poly (love that one)

Cartoon FX Free (first asset i ever downloaded)
